amendatorysection.para: The board shall charge and collect fees for its services under the Nebraska Appraisal Management Company Registration Act as follows: (1) An application fee of no more than three hundred fifty dollars; (2) an initial registration fee of no more than two thousand dollars; (3) a renewal registration fee of no more than one thousand five hundred dollars; and (4) a late renewal fee of twenty-five dollars for each month or portion of a month the fee is late.
